channel.title: The Seminal Sessions
channel.description: Soulfully mixed selections, tracks and tunes from the creative and eclectic musical mind of DJ Semi. Lock onto http://pressureradio.com each and every Tuesday from 6pm-8pm GMT to catch the live ride.
channel.itunes:subtitle: DJ Semi - Playing you Music the Way it Should Be...
channel.itunes:author: DJ Semi
channel.itunes:summary: Soulfully mixed selections, tracks and tunes from the creative and eclectic musical mind of DJ Semi. Lock onto http://pressureradio.com each and every Tuesday from 6pm-8pm GMT to catch the live ride.

item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 05-Jun-12
item.description: This weeks episode arrives hot on the heels of the extended Diamond Jubilee celebrations that have been taking place across the last 4 days. Funny how all of the thoughts of war and recession disappear from thought when the media focuses its mind on a different, more positive subject for a change. I'm glad that there is always room for focusing on positivity when it comes to good, deep & soulful music. This weeks show provides just that, with a sprinkling of new promos sandwiched in between some truly timeless classics. So a little something for all! Much respect to those locking on and supporting this podcast! Hope you enjoy the ride... DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 05-Jun-12 Shaun Escoffery - Let It Go (4 Hero Piano mix) Domu - Dangerous Times (Simbad Remix) Tone Scientist - Discrepency Tone Scientist - Temporal Theory Demarkus Lewis Feat. Janel Roland - Dream 2 Me (Unreleased Broken Mix) Leroy Burgess - Are You Feeling Me (DJ Semi Triby Re-Edit) Ceramic ft. Aisling Stephenson - Broken Dreams (Original Mix) Terry Hunter featuring Dana Divine - Be Thankful (Kenny Dopes Broken Mix) Atjazz feat. Robert Owens - Love Someone Mick Verma - U Are My Alcohol (Original Mix) Charles Webster feat. Diviniti - Be Yourself Tom Conrad & Andre Bonsor - First Contact (Original Mix) Khanya Balani & Mikki Afflick Feat. Nkulli Dube - Casual People (60 Hertz Project Mix) Blackjean & Kevin Visto Feat. Austin T - Keep on Dancin ("That DJ Semi Guy" Edit) Osaze - Who Knew (Mr A.L.I Full Vocal Mix) Kode9 - You Dont Wash (DJ Kicks Dub) Tamara Wellons - Euphoria (Jose Carretas Son Liva Instrumental Mix) Joey Negro presents Akabu - Searchin' (Motor City Drum Ensemble remix) Stephanie Cooke - Execuses (Ga Tek Dubstrumental) Matthias Heilbronn & Joeski - Sabrosito (Matthias Heilbronn Remix) Joey Negro presents Akabu feat Ovasoul 7 - Raw Love (Joey Negro Club Mix) Joey Negro presents Akabu - Phuture Bound (Shur-I-Kan remix) Tom Conrad & Andre Bonsor - The Calling (Original Mix) Seasons Recordings Evren Furtuna - My Miracle Baby (Original Mix) Morten Luco - Innervision (Rhythm Slaves Mix) DJ SEMI Official Website DJ SEMI @ GOOGLE + DJ SEMI @ PODOMATIC PRESSURE RADIO DJ SEMI @ TWITTER DJ SEMI @ MYSPACE and now available on ITUNES Catch yours truly, DJ Semi each week on PRESSURE RADIO – bringing you the best in Soulful, Broken, Jazzy, Deep, Tribal and Funky House tunes every Tuesday evening from 18:00 – 20:00 GMT.

This weeks episode arrives hot on the heels of the extended Diamond Jubilee celebrations that have been taking place across the last 4 days. Funny how all of the thoughts of war and recession disappear from thought when the media focuses its mind on a different, more positive subject for a change. I'm glad that there is always room for focusing on positivity when it comes to good, deep & soulful music. item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 29-May-12
item.description: With the heat continuing unabated in London town, I felt another serving of some more nu-jazz and broken grooves were in order. So get ready for another 2+ hours of jazzy audio nuggets to get you in the mood for the Jubilee weekend. Hope you enjoy! Dj Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 29-May-12 Raw Instict - De La Bass Kool and The Gang Feat. Lisa Stansfield - Too Hot The Brand New Heavies - Stay This Way (Morales Mix) Julius Papp featuring Lisa Shaw - Way Back (Broken Beat Vocal Mix) Heritage Orchestra - Skybreaks (Jazzanova Remix) Jazzanova - Burnin' (Jazzanova Mix) Jd73 - Dreams Jd73 feat. Fuzzy Jones - I See Jazzanova - Let Your Heart Be Free Jazzanova - Let Your Heart Be Free (Dub) Georg Levin - Keep on Making me High Lisa Stansfield - People Hold On (12 Inch New Jersey Jazz Mix) Scallymatic Orchestra - Autumn Forest Song (Buruman Remix) Miguel Migs featuring Lt - Get Down Miguel Migs ft. Sonny J Mason - Burnin' Up (Original Vocal) Simon Grey - The Galactica Suite (Nasty Institute Edit) DaSouL & Fabry Diglio feat. Joe Flame - Broken Love (Mad Boss Main) The Layabouts - Thank You (Doruk Ozlen Vocal Mix) Miguel Migs - The Jam (Original Mix) Da Black Connection - PWARS (Broken Beat Remix) Andy Holder Feat. Carl Stanley - Uncivilised People (Andy Holders Prime Time Dub) Copyright - Mato Grosso DJ Gregory - Triby Andy Holder feat Carl Stanley - Uncivilised People Miguel Migs - Check This Out Blak Beat Niks - The Sun Will Shine (Simon Grey Remix) Rasmus faver feat.Emily McEwan - Ever After (Samba Reprise) Reel People - It Will Be (Kyoto Jazz Massive Vocal Remix) DJ SEMI Official Website DJ SEMI @ GOOGLE + DJ SEMI @ PODOMATIC PRESSURE RADIO DJ SEMI @ TWITTER DJ SEMI @ MYSPACE and now available on ITUNES Catch yours truly, DJ Semi each week on PRESSURE RADIO – bringing you the best in Soulful, Broken, Jazzy, Deep, Tribal and Funky House tunes every Tuesday evening from 18:00 – 20:00 GMT. DJ Semi presents 'The Seminal Sessions', a weekly soulcast taking the discerning listener on an eclectic voyage through the best in old & nu-skool dance music.

item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 22-May-12
item.description: As the powerful heat of the Sun finally breaks through the over extended bout of spring showers that have buffeted the UK for the last 3 months, its time for us to pay tribute with some breaking of our own...2 hours + of broken beats awaits you in this weeks edition of the Seminal Sessions, some classic anthems from yesteryear, others much more obscure in nature. Either way, I trust that the vibe keeps you entertained throughout! Enjoy that sun now... DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 22-May-12 60 Hertz Project - Impact Soul (Original) Gene Douglas Feat. David Walker - Almost Heaven (Simon Grey Mix) Rich Medina vs. KemeticJust - Minstrel Speak (KemeticJust Mix) Julius Papp featuring Lisa Shaw - Way Back (Broken Beat Instrumental) J.S.O.U.L. AKA Black Sinatra - Love Frequency (Jonny Montana Remastered Lounge Broken Mix) The Rurals feat Lady Bird - Now & Then (Andy Compton Broken mix) Yasushi Ide - Certain Peace (Rainer Trüby Trio Remix) The Sura Quintet - Dancin' On The Milky Way Sunlightsquare - I Believe in Miracles (Broken Party Animal Mix) Mustafa feat. Carlene Graham - Energize (Aphrodisiax Broken Vox Mix) Kenny Carvajal - The Chase (Broken Mix) Jill Scott - Golden (Enochson Audiobuffed Mix) 3rd Core - Mindless & Broken (MJ Cole Mix) PH-7 - Space (Ju-Jupiter Broken Beat Mix) J & J vs Terry Moore - In Ur Presence (J & J' s Broken Vision) Tortured Soul - Another Lover (Jkriv Broken-Up Vocal Mix) Christos Kedras - Lets Funky (Broken Mix) Chuck Love - Beautiful Thang (Sven Van Hees Art Broken Mix) Vick Lavender feat R.J.Green - Do For Love (Bopstar's Re-touch Mix) Jared Douglas - Release (Martin's Broken Mix) Reel People featuring Sharlene Hector - The Rain (Rps Club mix) Morten Luco - Innervision (Original Broken Mix) Craig David vs Brandy - Whats Your Flava (Markus Enochson Broken Soul mix) Rhianna - Oh Baby (4 Hero Extended Remix) Alex Phountzi & Xantone Blacq - Another Way (Daz-I-Cue Broken Beat Mix) Jazztronik - Samurai (12inch Mix) Vikter Duplaix featuring Tye Tribbett & G.A. - I See the Sun DJ SEMI Official Website DJ SEMI @ GOOGLE + DJ SEMI @ PODOMATIC PRESSURE RADIO DJ SEMI @ TWITTER DJ SEMI @ MYSPACE and now available on ITUNES Catch yours truly, DJ Semi each week on PRESSURE RADIO – bringing you the best in Soulful, Broken, Jazzy, Deep, Tribal and Funky House tunes every Tuesday evening from 18:00 – 20:00 GMT. DJ Semi presents 'The Seminal Sessions', a weekly soulcast taking the discerning listener on an eclectic voyage through the best in old & nu-skool dance music.

item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 15-May-12
item.description: Monsoon May continues unabated, so whilst the rain beats down in London town its time to get the ear buds in and turn those soulful house beats up... Hope you enjoy the vibe! item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 12-May-12
item.description: A lil' extra edition of "The Seminal Sessions" for you to chow down on over the weekend, as I provided some live coverage for DJ Miloe's 'Downtown Soulcast' this Saturday afternoon. Mainly older deep & dubby grooves from the last 5 years on the set, with a few new trax & some Downtown Soulcast faves thrown in for good measure. Plenty of fun for all the Pressure family, so tuck in and enjoy! Peace... DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 12-May-12 Lebzito feat. Thulipilis - Singing (Brother C SoulTwins Broken Journey Mix) Afro Jazz Pioneers - Song for Letta (Broken Mix) Jazztronik - Samurai (Yukihiro Fukutomi Remix) Shaun Escoffery - Let it Go (Jazzanova Vocal Mix) Irfan Rainy & Rex Leon Feat. Vaceo - Singer of Songs (the Vinyl Ears Mix) SK95 Feat Kele B - Tired (Lilac Jeans Rnb House Vocal Mix) Marlon D vs Dennis Ferrer - Breeze (Main Mix) Evren Furtuna - My Miracle Baby (Original Mix) Lee Tristram - Rhythm Is Love (Lees Main Love Mix) Lee Tristram - That Sound Poussez Vs. Demarkus Lewis Feat. Hannah Khemoh - Passin Thru (Sean Mccabe Vocal Remix) Mood II Swing Feat Tara J - Passing Time (Main Mix) Jihad Muhammad - The Dawn (Nj Project remix) Reel People Feat. Vanessa Freeman - Tomorrow Never Comes Shur-I-Kan - Generations (Original Mix) Atjazz, Domu & Yannah Valdevit - City Madness Incognito - Nights Over Egypt (MJ Cole Remix) Matthias 'Matty' Heilbronn ft. Monique Bingham - Go Getter (Soulflower Mix) Redsoul & RaShaan Houston - It's Alright (Soularis Remix) Ollie Brooke Feat. Kylie Auldist & Damon Grant - Love, Lies, Life (Matt Bandy's Limestone Vocal) Only Freak - Tiny Forces (Seer Tesh remix) Roberto De Carlos Feat. Joshua - Magic Star (Simon Grey Vocal) Galaxy Group - Ease Back (Ease Back) Incognito - Freedom To Love (Simon Grey Remix) DJ SEMI Official Website DJ SEMI @ GOOGLE + DJ SEMI @ PODOMATIC PRESSURE RADIO DJ SEMI @ TWITTER DJ SEMI @ MYSPACE and now available on ITUNES Catch yours truly, DJ Semi each week on PRESSURE RADIO – bringing you the best in Soulful, Broken, Jazzy, Deep, Tribal and Funky House tunes every Tuesday evening from 18:00 – 20:00 GMT.

A lil' extra edition of "The Seminal Sessions" for you to chow down on over the weekend, as I provided some live coverage for DJ Miloe's 'Downtown Soulcast' this Saturday afternoon.
Mainly older deep & dubby grooves from the last 5 years on the set, with a few new trax & some Downtown Soulcast faves thrown in for good measure.
Plenty of fun for all the Pressure family, so tuck in and enjoy!
Peace...

item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 08-May-12
item.description: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 08-May-12 A more chilled affair awaits you in this weeks episode, with some broken beat gems sandwiched in between some deeper trax that have been released over the last few weeks. Not really much more to add other than to download and enjoy! item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 01-May-12
item.description: Happy May Day one and all! With a new month comes a new mix for you to sample. Mostly new cuts & jams for you to chow down on, so should be a good audio feast for you to savour. Special mention to this weeks highlight track from Evren Furtuna - 'My Miracle Baby' is definitely my fave track for 2012 to date, and will be most definitely getting some extended play over the next few sessions! Hope you enjoy... item.dc:creator: DJ Semi
item.itunes:summary:
Happy May Day one and all!
With a new month comes a new mix for you to sample. Mostly new cuts & jams for you to chow down on, so should be a good audio feast for you to savour.
Special mention to this weeks highlight track from Evren Furtuna - 'My Miracle Baby' is definitely my fave track for 2012 to date, and will be most definitely getting some extended play over the next few sessions!
Hope you enjoy...

item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 24-Apr-12
item.description: The last show of April brings with it an extended fusion of soulful house selections and latin beats for you to savour. Much respect to '4 Da People' for providing much of this episodes content, and a special nod to Rasmus Faber for two ever classic cuts from yesteryear - much respect for the enduring quality evident in both 'Ever After' & 'Autosoul'. Hope you all enjoy the vibes! DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 24-Apr-12 Tom Glide & the Luv All Stars feat Tio - Come To Me (Tom Moulton Mix) Incognito - Put A Little Lovin' In Your Heart (Bluey Remix) Ollie Brooke Feat. item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 17-Apr-12
item.description: Greetings fella music lovers! A ton of new & classic, deep and broken beats awaits you in this weeks soulcast...shouts out in particular to Pressure Radio's DJ Miloe for his remix take on the 'Singing' track from Lebzito - excellent production value from the Soul Twins studio as always! The rest of the show speaks for itself, so without further ado, get the download down and the ear buds in to enjoy this sonic ride... Much respect always, DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 17-Apr-12 Tom Glide And The Luv All Stars Feat. Tio - Luv Is Comin Up (Radio Edit) Jazzanova - Look What You're Doin' To Me (MCDE Remix Morid And Hifi3000 Dub Edit) Louise Golbey - No Pretence (Drew Beats Mix) Morra de Rey feat. Thulipilis - Singing (Miloe SoulTwins House Journey Remix) Jazzanova - Look What You're Doin' To Me (Motor City Drum Ensemble Remix) Ferry Ultra feat. item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 10-Apr-12
item.description: Happy Easter one & all! Hope you had fun in your extended weekend break whatever you got up to...for my part, aside from a long overdue mass clear out and tidy up of the garden shed, some serious crate & soul searching went down this bank holiday weekend...I could tell you all about it, but as always, its probably a tale best understood if you download and listen to it yourselves... Much respect to Mr Bolland, Jazzanova, Copyright and Franck Roger for providing me with this weeks audio ammunition! Hope and trust that you enjoy... Much respect, DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 10-Apr-12 CJ Bolland - Sugar Is Sweeter (Monkey Mafia Mix) Jazzanova - Theme From Belle Et Fou (Danny Krivit Edit) Jazzanova - Dance The Dance (Atjazz Remix) Universal Language - Together Deep Suite - Scarlett Lebzito feat. Thulipilis - Singing (Original) Tomson Feat. Thembeka - Darkness Into Light (Atjazz Astro Dub Mix) April Hill - Today (J & J's Soultempo Mix) Pirahnahead Feat. Carolyn Harding - This is Why I Sing (Terry Hunter's Bang Sunday Vocal Mix) Copyright feat. Imaani - Wizeman (Copyright 2012 Remix) Copyright feat. item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 03-Apr-12
item.description: Bass n' beats all the way in this episode, with an after touch of Miami Winter Conference magic thrown in for good measure... Hope you enjoy! FYI, got a party for you to check out across the coming bank holiday weekend...some of the Pressure family headed by Andy Ward will be taking over The Cotton Mill in Warrington this Saturday night 7th April - if interested in attending, check out the following link for more info! http://pressureradio.com/2012/03/25/vocal-booth-north-uk-event/vocal-booth-north-andy-ward/ DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 03-Apr-12 The Rebirth - Got Your Madness Lebzito feat. Thulipilis - Singing (Brother C SoulTwins Broken Journey Mix) Universal Language - Do You Remember Azee Project feat. Lucas Arruda - Kurin Morra de Rey feat. Bongz Jazzman - All I Am (BSC Quebrada Mix) Universal Language - Sunfish Deep Suite - Minimal Subliminal SoulCreation - Sueno En Ti (Peak Mix) DJ Hakuei feat. Jimmy Roland - My House (Danny Clark Solid Ground Classic Insturmental Remix) MVIP - Barrique (Original Mix) Copyright feat. Imaani - Wizeman (The Layabouts Future Retro Vocal Mix) TL Cross - Best Kept Secret (Secret Late Night Mix) Something Good - Wannabe (Extended Mix) Distant People Feat. Nicole Mitchell - Gimme Heat (Original Mix) Pirahnahead Feat. DJ Semi presents 'The Seminal Sessions', a weekly soulcast taking the discerning listener on an eclectic voyage through the best in old & nu-skool dance music.

item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 27-Mar-12
item.description: As Spring dawns on us, this weeks episode of the Seminal Sessions encompasses a fresh selection of deep & jazzy beats to usher the new season in with style. With the usual blend of up front promo cutz and classic cuts from the back of the old vinyl crate, there's bound to be a lil' something here for everyone... Hope you enjoy the vibe! DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 27-Mar-12 Down To The Bone - Downtown Shuffle Over Street - Jazz Cigarette (Original Mix) Les Jeux Sont Funk - Easily Groove Odyssey - Set Me Free (Breaka Mix) Groove Odyssey - On The Jazz (Anjuna House Mix) Groove Odyssey - Shine Over Street - Overture (Original Mix) Antonio Andali - A&A Jerome Sydenham & Willie Graff - Your House (*****L Remix) Chez Damier - Can You Feel It (Steve Bug Re-Dub) Afroseeds Feat. Leroy Burgess - Turn it Out (Ig Culture Remix) Danny J Lewis - Can't Nobody (Original Mix) Marco Finotello feat. item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 20-Mar-12
item.description: This weeks show opens up with another D&B salvo that will test out the strongest of speakers...make sure you warn your neighbours before the Alex Reece track hits their ear drums!!! Things mellow out a touch after this initial volley, with some promo tracks from MWC 2012 and a belated tribute to Whitney Houston sandwiched in between (thanks to Mr Geoffrey C for another cracking remix effort there!). Buds in... DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 20-Mar-12 Yasmin Ft Shy Fx & Ms Dynamite - Light Up The World (Radio Edit) Hint - Here's Another One Alex Reece - Pulp Friction Makoto - Take My Soul Baby (Remix) Makoto - Inside Your Love (Nookie Remix) Raw Artistic Soul - The Light (Dub Beats) Fast Vision Soul & 60 Hertz Project - Tapta Beach (Trancemicsoul Remix) DJ Marcuis pres. Rachel McDonald & The Antidotes - Everybody's Dancing (Websonic's PTA Mix) Domu - Last Encounter DJ Romain Feat Emory Toler - I Wanna Go (Ros Instrumental Dub Mix) Manuel Regnet - Joy (Original Mix) Whitney Houston - Love Will Save the Day (Geoffrey C Remix) Houz' Neegroz - How Do You Love A Black Woman? (Fierce Beats Remix) Joseph Junior, MAQman - I Don`t See Love (Original Mix) David Labeij - Julie Lesspace Hideo Kobayashi - Cosmogony (Nagano Milky Way Dub) Domu - Raw Baby V.Underground Feat. item.dc:creator: DJ Semi
item.itunes:summary:
This weeks show opens up with another D&B salvo that will test out the strongest of speakers...make sure you warn your neighbours before the Alex Reece track hits their ear drums!!!
Things mellow out a touch after this initial volley, with some promo tracks from MWC 2012 and a belated tribute to Whitney Houston sandwiched in between (thanks to Mr Geoffrey C for another cracking remix effort there!).
Buds in...
DJ Semi
The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 20-Mar-12
Yasmin Ft Shy Fx & Ms Dynamite - Light Up The World (Radio Edit) Hint - Here's Another One Alex Reece - Pulp Friction Makoto - Take My Soul Baby (Remix) Makoto - Inside Your Love (Nookie Remix) Raw Artistic Soul - The Light (Dub Beats) Fast Vision Soul & 60 Hertz Project - Tapta Beach (Trancemicsoul Remix) DJ Marcuis pres. item.title: The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 13-Mar-12
item.description: We continue the chillaxing theme this week, with Monodeluxe and The Rurals taking centre stage in the proceedings. Definitely a mix to kick back to at the end of a long days and your return from the day job! Get downloading, buds in, sit back, relax and enjoy the smooth vibes! DJ Semi The Seminal Sessions - DJ Semi - 13-Mar-12 Makoto - Futures Call (Makoto remix) Makoto - Time (Kyoto Jazz Massive remix) Makoto - Four Silver Rings Monodeluxe feat. Jannae Jordan - Time Remix Project (The Disclosure Project Dub Remix) Aya - Looking for The Sun Hugo Barritt - Lilly Hole (Pezzner Remix) Monodeluxe feat. Jannae Jordan - Time Remix Project (Monodeluxe - Soul City Remix) Monodeluxe - By Jonny Montana & Dawn Williams - I Choose Me (Deeper Dub Mix) Aya - I Will Never Give in Lee Tristram - Fallin Soundphaze - Before Dark Julius Papp & Lisa Shaw - Miracle (Smash Hunter Disco Soul Vocal Mix) Tony Remy & Bluey - Where Did You Go? Ross Couch - Postcard From Paris Torin Rea and Yogi (Random Soul) feat. Louis Hale - Let's Do This (Yogi and Husky's RSR Deep Wash) Mark Grant Feat.
